thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 23 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-George Feldenkreis Sends Letter To Perry Ellis Board

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-George Feldenkreis Sends Letter To Perry Ellis Board
text:
May 23 (Reuters) - Perry Ellis International Inc:
* GEORGE FELDENKREIS SENDS LETTER TO PERRY ELLIS BOARD * GEORGE FELDENKREIS SAYS WILL WITHDRAW OFFER TO ACQUIRE COMPANY IF SPECIAL COMMITTEE REFUSES TO COMMIT TO AN EXPEDITED CONCLUSION OF SALES PROCESS
* GEORGE FELDENKREIS - CALLS ON PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL’S SPECIAL COMMITTEE TO COMMIT TO CONCLUDING NEGOTIATIONS, ENTER DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT BY MAY 29
* GEORGE FELDENKREIS SAYS OWNS ABOUT 10.8 PERCENT OF PERRY ELLIS OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK
* FELDENKREIS SAYS NOMINATED FOUR DIRECTORS FOR ELECTION TO PERRY ELLIS’ BOARD AT 2018 ANNUAL MEETING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
